data.title: The Christian Broadcasting Network on LinkedIn: You do not want to miss Hulk Hogan's incredible testimony of how God…
data.meta_description:
You do not want to miss Hulk Hogan's incredible testimony of how God radically changed his life forever! 

You can watch Hulk Hogan's testimony here:… | 17 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
Trevia Tyler Ricks @TreviaA 2h Janet Jackson - Let's Wait Awhile https://lnkd.in/gDbnf8Fw via YouTube I tell u,she&Mary r & wer DEFINITELY my sisters Even back then, #God showed her some things,even down2sum styles. #God shos as He wills to those who r 4 me. KEY & PROFOUND lyrics r mentioned in this song. https://lnkd.in/g_fcNW5m N this 1,she saw the then-future concernin me&my then-boyfriend/now-husband.She even saw my condo #. It was #403. https://lnkd.in/gQg25ETz N this 1, Mary saw things about my/r past, my present, & sum things n the future. #God does work n mysterious ways. Again,ther r KEY & PROFOUND THINGS N ALL THESE SONGS,even down2sum styles, thoughts,&feelings. I even heard Janet say1time that Mary is HER SPIRITUAL SISTER. I say they r&wer my sis4diff reasons.This is a diff age(since August 2019)&ther r many things we need2learn&relearn(those who r led2do this). 4instance, ther scriptures that they overlooked2take out.These scriptures talk about A PERSON RETURNING,even Sheba. See the connections. That's y I'll start readin the Ethiopian Bible. Ther r many things takin out of the Bible,since Constantine& #catholicism took over.They took out things2 suit their interests, smh. The Ethiopian bible is the CLOSEST THING 2 the WHOLE TRUTH! Yes,thers heaven&hell&ppl should beware. However, God also says SUM OTHER THINGS N HIS WORD. I much STUDY A LOT MORE. There is also SOOO much #dejavue,even2the sound of today's hip-hop that seems so familiar2 me.The masses r also like they were as the Word indicates.Anyway, I must do sum DEEP STUDYING!

Exercise caution when receiving information, for appearances can be deceiving. Not everything that presents itself before you is as it seems. While comprehending the immediate situation is crucial, remember that understanding is not the final destination. Press forward with unwavering faith, believing that the Lord will provide guidance and clarity on your journey. Trust in the process, and let your faith be a guiding light as you move towards what lies ahead.
